activity.name: Popovich Comedy Pet Theater at Planet Hollywood Resort and Casino
activity.description: Gregory Popovich's Comedy Pet Theater is an extravaganza of juggling, European-style comedy and afurry entourage of performing cats and dogs. This unique and hilarious show featuring cats and amazing dogs, all who have been rescued from animal shelters. The ring-leader is Moscow Circus Superstar and master juggler Gregory Popovich. Bring the whole family for an afternoon of fun!
